description: A reckless but sometimes effective practice the Lizalfos partook in was to attach weaponry to their tails. Dinolfos in particular were skilled in grafting Axe heads to their tails to serve as an extra weapon.
requirementsTooltip: You must select Vakat as your hero.
tooltip: Treehoppers, Dinolfos Butcher, Chameleofos Striker, and Dinolfos Footman gain axes on their tails, adding +15 Hack damage.
